title.rendered: NEWTECONS – TOP 50 VIETNAMESE COMPANIES WITH ATTRACTIVE EMPLOYER BRAND 2021

content.rendered:
At the recent online awards ceremony, Anphabe – Pioneer consulting firm providing Employer Brand & Happy Workforce solutions, announced the list of “TOP 50 VIETNAMESE COMPANIES WITH ATTRACTIVE EMPLOYER BRAND 2021”. Newtecons is honored to be included in this list.

Attractive Employer Brand is one of the prestigious categories according to the objective assessment of individuals in the same business based on 6 groups of criteria: Salary, Bonus, Welfare; Promotion chances; Culture and Values; Leader team; Quality of Work and Life; Company reputation. Anphabe conducted a poll of 65,000 experienced employees from approximately 600 organizations in 20 different industries around the country in order to present the results of the categories at the awards ceremony.

retained employees by taking practical steps such as creating a professional, comfortable, and friendly working environment, being interested in developing successor teams. In addition, Newtecons is committed to retaining its reputation as the company with the best welfare regime and the remuneration policy in the construction industry.

In 20 years of development, with over 700 employees, generations of Newtecons employees have gotten values from the motto of developing the greatest life for employees and assisting employees in becoming the best version of themselves.

Investing in human resources is an investment in the Company’s current and future success. This philosophy is the foundation that helps Newtecons develop specific and practical action plans for employees. Newtecons Leaders aspire to make the company a second home for its employees, where they may work, achieve personal goals, and dedicate iconic works for life.

Newtecons is one of TOP 100 BEST COMPANIES TO WORK FOR IN ASIA 2021 voted by HR Asia – the leading magazine on Human Resources in Asia.

To achieve ATTRACTIVE EMPLOYER BRAND in 2021, Newtecons would like to thank the Anphabe professional community and the voters. Thank Newtecons people who work hard to build our reputation.
